caption: Interactive 3D model controlling jet settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.message: Accessing Jet Menu
Accessing Jet Menu

Turn on/off Jet Pump 1.
Note: Anytime a pump has been manually turned on, it will automatically turn off after approximately 20 minutes.
If at this time you desire more jet operation you may simply turn the pump(s) back on.
actionMsg.title: Jet Pump 1

actionMsg.message:
Turn on/off Jet 2 Pump 2 (if equipped).
Note: Anytime a pump has been manually turned on, it will automatically turn off after approximately 20 minutes.
If at this time you desire more jet operation you may simply turn the pump(s) back on.
actionMsg.title: Jet Pump 2

actionMsg.message: Tap "OK" on the pop-up menu to activate for 20-minute period.

Turn on/off Jet Pump 1.
Note: Anytime a pump has been manually turned on, it will automatically turn off after approximately 20 minutes.
If at this time you desire more jet operation you may simply turn the pump(s) back on.
actionMsg.title: Jet Pump 1

actionMsg.message:
Turn on/off Jet 2 Pump 2 (if equipped).
Note: Anytime a pump has been manually turned on, it will automatically turn off after approximately 20 minutes.
If at this time you desire more jet operation you may simply turn the pump(s) back on.
actionMsg.title: Jet Pump 2

actionMsg.message: Tap "OK" on the pop-up menu to activate for 20-minute period.
20 minute timer will be visible under the button and in the main menu.
actionMsg.title: IR therapy is now starting

caption: Interactive 3D model controlling the temperature via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Increasing the temperature.
The maximum water temperature setting for your spa is 104°F (40°C).

Decreasing the temperature.
The minimum water temperature setting for your spa is 65°F (18°C).

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling the light settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Interior/Intensity Light: Press to activate the interior lights.
The lights will default to the last setting used at a 100% intensity
The lights can also be turned on b selecting a color or pressing the blend button.

Speed Control: Controls the blending speed for the lights.
Tap to increase or freeze the blending speed, of the colors.

Solid Color Selector: Continually tap to scroll through and select a single color.
The colors available are: red, orange, green, teal, blue, violet, white and yellow.

Exterior Light: The exterior corner lighting has 2 settings.
The lights display a solid White color only.
By continually tapping the button you will scroll through the following:

Press once for high intensity.
Press a second time for Auto feature.
Press a third time to turn off.

Either preset has an 8-hour timeout.
Lights on from 7pm to 12am.

caption: Interactive 3D model of activating the ClearRay Active Oxygen system via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
The ClearRay Active Oxygen® system on demand
feature activates the water purification system.
Continuously tap this button to activate the system for:
1 tap: 1 hour
2 taps: 2 hours
3 taps: 3 hours

NOTE: When the ClearRay Active Oxygen® system is on,
due to a programmed or scheduled setting, the feature cannot be turned off.
actionMsg.title: ClearRay Active Oxygen® system

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling the heat settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.message: Once the heat mode is selected, press this button to confirm your selection.
actionMsg.title: Confirm

actionMsg.message:
Day Heating: When programmed to Day, the spa will only be allowed to heat the water
between 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM every day. The hours cannot be adjusted.

Auto Heating: When programmed to Auto, the spa will maintain the water temperature
to the set temperature. Heating will occur when necessary.

Economy Heating: This is an energy saving heating program that allows the spa to heat during non-peak hours.
When programmed to Economy, the spa will only be allowed to heat the water between 5:00 PM to 7:00 AM every day.
The hours cannot be adjusted.

caption: Interactive 3D model of programming the true water filtration via the media screen.
suggestedLabel: Control True Water Filtration Settings in 3D

actionMsg.message:
During a primary filtration, the circulation pump and the ClearRay Active Oxygen®
system are activated. The factory default cycle starts at 12:00 AM and last for 8 hours.
Displays the number of days left for True™ Ozone unit before a replacement is needed.
actionMsg.title: Additional Information: Ozone

actionMsg.message: Displays the number of days left for True™ Air Filter unit before a replacement is needed.
actionMsg.title: Additional Information: Filter

actionMsg.message: Displays the amount of time the True Water™ System has been activated.
actionMsg.title: Additional Information: Run Time

actionMsg.message:
The factory default cycle starts at 12:00 a.m. but can be changed.
Scroll through the first column to change the hour in 1-hour increments.
You cannot adjust the minutes column.

To select am or pm, you will need to round a 12-hour period.
actionMsg.title: Cycle Start Time

actionMsg.message: Changes canceled. This reverts to the last saved time.
Accepting and saving all changes.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
The circulation pump and True Water™ System are always active.
Time and duration cannot be altered for the cycle.

• System runs 24-hours.
actionMsg.title: 24 Hour Mode

actionMsg.message:
The factory default cycle starts at 12:00 a.m. and provides 8 hours of filtration.
Time and duration cannot be altered for the cycles, but you can change the start time.

• Factory default cycle starts at 12:00 a.m.
• 8 hours of primary filtration per day (2 hours at 12 a.m., 6 a.m., 12 p.m., 6 p.m.).
The circulation pump and True Water™ System are active.
• 4 purge cycles (15-minute purge runs at the end of each cycle).
The circulation and air pump are active.
actionMsg.title: Light Mode

actionMsg.message:
The factory default cycle starts at 12 a.m. and provides 12 hours of filtration.
Time and duration cannot be altered.

• Factory default cycle starts at 12 a.m.
12 hours of primary filtration per day (2 hours at 12 a.m., 4 a.m., 8 a.m., 12 p.m., 4 p.m., 8 p.m.).
The circulation pump and True Water™ System are active.
• 6 purge cycles (10-minute purge runs at the end of each cycle).
The circulation and air pump are active.
actionMsg.title: Medium Mode

actionMsg.message:
The factory default cycle starts at 12 a.m. and provides 16 hours of filtration.
Time and duration cannot be altered.

• Factory default cycle starts at 12 a.m.
16 hours of primary filtration per day (2 hours at 12 a.m., 3 a.m., 6 a.m., 9 a.m., 12 p.m., 3 p.m., 6 p.m, 9 p.m..).
The circulation pump and True Water™ System are active.
• 8 purge cycles (7.5-minute purge runs at the end of each cycle).
The circulation and air pump are active.
actionMsg.title: Heavy Mode

actionMsg.message: Changes canceled. This reverts to the last saved time.
Accepting and saving all changes.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message: Changes canceled. This reverts to the last saved time.
Accepting and saving all changes.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through this block to change the hour in 1-hour increments.
You cannot adjust the minutes column.
actionMsg.title: Hour Block

caption: Interactive 3D model of setting water care reminders via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Water Refresh Timer
Scroll through the column to change days in 30-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 180 days.

To continually maintain the water healthy and clean,
in addition to chemical maintenance, it should be programmed as instructed.

ProClarity Filter Timer
Scroll through the column to change days in 10-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 180 days.

To continually maintain the water healthy and clean,
in addition to chemical maintenance, it should be programmed as instructed.

ProClarity Depth Filter Timer
Scroll through the column to change days in 10-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 90 days.

It is not recommended for this feature to be turned OFF.
To continually maintain the water healthy and clean,
in addition to chemical maintenance, it should be programmed as instructed.

Ture™ Ozone Timer
Scroll through the column to change days in 30-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 730 days.

It is not recommended for this feature to be turned OFF.
To continually maintain the water healthy and clean,
in addition to chemical maintenance, it should be programmed as instructed.
Changes canceled. This reverts to the last saved setting.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message: Accepting and saving all changes.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through the column to change days in 10-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 90 days.
actionMsg.title: Day Column

actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

Scroll through the column to change days in 30-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 730 days.
actionMsg.title: Day Column

caption: Interactive 3D model of setting water care reminders via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Water Refresh Timer
Scroll through the column to change days in 30-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 180 days.

To continually maintain the water healthy and clean,
in addition to chemical maintenance, it should be programmed as instructed.

ProClarity Filter Timer
Scroll through the column to change days in 10-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 180 days.

To continually maintain the water healthy and clean,
in addition to chemical maintenance, it should be programmed as instructed.

ProClarity Depth Filter Timer
Scroll through the column to change days in 10-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 90 days.

It is not recommended for this feature to be turned OFF.
To continually maintain the water healthy and clean,
in addition to chemical maintenance, it should be programmed as instructed.

Ture™ Ozone Timer
Scroll through the column to change days in 30-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 730 days.

It is not recommended for this feature to be turned OFF.
To continually maintain the water healthy and clean,
in addition to chemical maintenance, it should be programmed as instructed.
Changes canceled. This reverts to the last saved setting.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message: Accepting and saving all changes.

The range is from OFF (---) to 90 days.

caption: Interactive 3D model of locking the spa via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Note: This mode has a timeout of 2 hours.
The spa should not be left in this lock mode for an extended period.
Especially in colder climate or when freezing conditions exist.
Changes canceled. This reverts to the last saved setting.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message:
Accepting and saving all changes.

The Settings Menu and all its functions are disabled,
but the spa will still perform all scheduled tasks.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.
actionMsg.title: Number Column

actionMsg.message: Changes canceled. This reverts to the last saved setting.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message:
Accepting and saving all changes.

All activation and adjustment features are disabled
but the spa will still perform all scheduled tasks.

Scroll through each column to select a number.

Scroll through each column to select a number.

caption: Interactive 3D model of unlocking the spa via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Lock Menu
Select one of the locked features.
Each feature can be unlocked in the same way.

Note: A default passcode can be used in case the original passcode is lost or forgotten.
The code "0772" will unlock the locked setting.
Changes canceled. This reverts to the last saved setting.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message:
Accepting and saving all changes.

This feature is now unlocked.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.

caption: Interactive 3D model of accessing diagnostics menu via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Note: Most of the information provided in this menu is to assist
a qualified technician troubleshoot the system.

Displays various system information about the hot tub.
This information is helpful when servicing the hot tub.
actionMsg.title: System information

actionMsg.message:
Displays any faults detected by the hot tub.
It will store up to 50 fault settings.
actionMsg.title: Fault Log

actionMsg.message:
Once clicked, the test for the GFCI breaker will begin.
The result will return either a pass or fail message.
actionMsg.title: GFCI Test
